articles.author: BY MARÍA VERZA
articles.title: Australian castaway recounts comfort he felt adrift at sea, thanks to meditation, swimming and dog - The Associated Press
articles.description: He quit his corporate job and moved to Mexico to pursue his dream of sailing solo across the ocean. Australian Timothy Shaddock bought his 30-foot catamaran two years ago in the Pacific resort of Puerto Vallarta. He needed a place to live and he liked the iso…
articles.content:
MANZANILLO, Mexico (AP) He quit his corporate job and moved to Mexico to pursue his dream of sailing solo across the ocean.
